thread.title: BRIEF-‍Clearwater Compliance Says Has Raised Capital Through An Investment From Altaris Capital Partners, LLC​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Clearwater Compliance Says Has Raised Capital Through An Investment From Altaris Capital Partners, LLC​

organizations.name: clearwater compliance says has raised capital through an investment from altaris capital partners

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - ‍Clearwater Compliance: ‍
* CLEARWATER COMPLIANCE SAYS IT HAS RAISED CAPITAL THROUGH AN INVESTMENT FROM ALTARIS CAPITAL PARTNERS, LLC​
* CLEARWATER COMPLIANCE - TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED​ Source text for Eikon:
